name: Bees'N'Trees || Slingy Bee || Pc / Android
description:
Hello o/

This is my first solo dev game, and I've finally gotten around to posting it here. Mostly made this for a bit of experience, but releasing it and having others possibly play it sounded like fun so here we are. 
Bees'N'Trees, or as I should have renamed it, Slingy Bee, is a casual game taking a lot of inspiration from Flappy Bird, though with slingshot controls. Though I originally intended to have the bee sling in the opposite direction of where you are pulling, I felt players could get stuck in the corners/ edges, so I opted to a sort of sling pull control scheme. 

Hope you enjoy <3

Controls: Click/ tap on the bee and drag in the direction you wish to sling it, then release. 

Goal: Go for a highscore and don't touch the vines at the top and bottom of the screen.

Bugs: Good chance there will be some, I know that the game is a bit of a mess and different resolutions, this would be because I had my phones resolution as the base for the game an tried to get it to a state where it would look ok on other devices.
